items.abstract: A graphene layer was directly aminated with polyethylenimine and a novel magnetic nanoplatform for bioconjugation of biologically active compounds was obtained.
title: Sulfhydrylated graphene-encapsulated iron nanoparticles directly aminated with polyethylenimine: a novel magnetic nanoplatform for bioconjugation of gamma globulins and polyclonal antibodies
